name: Offer Calculation Beta
query:
select  b.name,
        a.item_code,
        a.qty,
        a.uom,
        a.price_list_rate,
        a.net_rate,
        a.net_amount,
        a.ll_design,
        a.ll_bom,
        a.ll_core_price*a.qty,
        a.ll_hv_coil_price*a.qty,
        a.ll_lv_coil_price*a.qty,
        EXTRACT(amount from `tabBOM Item where parent=a.ll_bom )
        a.ll_rest_price*a.qty,
        (a.ll_core_price+a.ll_hv_coil_price+a.ll_lv_coil_price+a.ll_rest_price)*a.qty,
        a.ll_gross_profit,
        a.ll_direct_labour*a.qty,
        a.ll_direct_overhead*a.qty,
        a.ll_freight*a.qty,
        a.net_rate*0.01*a.qty,
        a.net_rate*0.02*a.qty,
        a.net_rate*0.04*a.qty,
        (a.ll_direct_labour+a.ll_direct_overhead+a.ll_freight+a.net_rate*0.01+a.net_rate*0.02+a.net_rate*0.04)*a.qty,
        a.ll_ebitda,
        a.ll_ebitda/87.5,
        a.ll_ebitda_percent as "EBITDA Per:Percent:90"
 from `tabQuotation` b, `tabQuotation Item` a
 where b.name=a.parent
 and b.transaction_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
